name: Flame of Mirrors (itch)
description:
Flame of Mirrors is indie-horror game.

Available demo version of the game.

Enjoy and dont forget Vote for on Greenlight!


There were series of mysterious fires in the city. Many people were missing. Firemen, who were at those facilities, noticed strange things. They claimed that they had seen other people in a reflection of mirrors. No bodies were found.
You are fire inspector, who must check the last object to determine a cause of a fire. The object is a house of mirrors. But everything is not as easy as it seems at first glance. Mirrors hide horror of flames.

In The Flame of Mirrors You need to go into mysterious mazes which shrouded in a mystery, soot and smoke.
You have to close your eyes in front of mirrors, and they will teleport you through a confusing corridors, show horrors of fire and try to burn You.
You should only rely on sounds, intuition and dim backlight of radio, if you want to get out of them.
